first_translate: is siegren  going to be my partner for tonight’s ball?
I haven’t asked him yet.
then I’ll do it.

hangle: 공작님에게 해 달라고 한 적 없는데요?
first_translate: but father, you never said anything about that before...
well, if not me or siegren, then who else would escort you?

hangle: 하지만 성인이 되어 보호자와 가는 건 촌스러운 일이잖아요.
first_translate: it’d look childish  if I went with my guardian now that I’m grown up.
what’s wrong with being a little childish every once in a while...?
I am your father after all.
abel...
didn’t I just melt your heart right there?
if so, why don’t you call me “father” instead of “your grace?”
fine...
give back what belongs to me.
lady fiona is here.
she came with duke abel.
we must go greet our host first.
right.
not that I want to though.
o-oh...! abel isn’t on good terms with the royal family.
my goodness.

hangle: 설마 공작이 여기에 올 줄은 몰랐군요.
first_translate: I didn’t think his grace was coming today.
this is such a rare invitation from her majesty herself.
of course we had to come.
and may I ask who this young lady beside you might be?
your majesty.
I’m fiona haylon.
ah yes,
the one everyone has been talking about lately.
you’re duke haylon’s adopted daughter, aren’t you?
that’s quite unusual, having your adoptive father as your partner for the night.

hangle: 아직 제 눈에 차는 상대가 없기에.
first_translate: it’s because no other man caught my eye yet.

hangle: 와, 코앞에서 이런 말을 들으니 부끄러워.
first_translate: haha, how embarrassing hearing something like that out loud.
her grace seems very fond of you.

hangle: 보아하니 제가 피오나 영애에 대해 들은 소문은 전부 오해였나 봅니다?
first_translate: from what I see, everything people say about you appears to be false rumors.
indeed they are.

hangle: 제가 모르는 걸 보니 신경 쓸 가치가 없는 이야기인 게 분명하군요.
first_translate: as long as you know nothing about them, those stories shouldn’t concern you at all.

hangle: 고아하신 황후 폐하마저 그런 소문에 휘둘리고 계신 건 아니길 바랍니다.
first_translate: I hope even someone as kind-hearted as yourself wouldn’t fall prey to baseless gossip.

hangle: 공작의 그 당당한 태도는 몇 년 동안 똑같군요.
first_translate: duke abel still hasn’t changed much over these years.
no matter when, he always remains himself.

hangle: 어떻게 나이를 먹어도 여전히 건방지니? 라는 말 아냐?
first_translate: or maybe she meant, “how could he remain arrogant despite growing older.”

hangle: 황후 폐하는 뵐 때마다 괄목하게 되는군요.
first_translate: every time I meet you, I can’t help but feel amazed by you.

hangle: 고귀한 분답게 세월의 흐름을 순순히 받아들이시는 모습이 보기 좋습니다.
first_translate: it’s wonderful seeing you accept aging gracefully, unlike most others.
maybe she actually meant, “you’ve aged a lot since last time,” huh?

hangle: 괜히 아벨이 중앙에서 지원을 못 받는 게 아니었어.
first_translate: now I understand why abel doesn’t get any support from central pandora.
talk about awkwardness...
excuse me for interrupting--
prince siegren.
prince siegren,
interrupting us mid-conversation is rude!
I apologize, your majesty.
lady fiona.
yes?

hangle: 같이 시간을 보내는 걸 허락해 주겠나.
first_translate: do you allow me to spend some time with you?
so he wants to take you away from me.
I won’t let you have her.
abel?
why don’t we hear what the lady thinks?
of course...
an honor indeed.
s-siegren?!
wh-why does it seem like he’s trying to seduce me?!
with that said,
please excuse us, your majesties.
siegren,
are you alright?
alright? what do you mean?
I’m referring to how you acted earlier.
like how?
I-I don’t know how to put this into words...
it felt like you were flirting with me.

hangle: 하지만 손등에 입을 맞추는 건 사교계에서는 늘 있는 일이고…
first_translate: but kissing hands is common practice among nobles...
fiona.

hangle: 다른 놈들이 널 쳐다보고 있어서 일부러 그랬어.
first_translate: I did that only because many men were staring at you.

hangle: 이제야 내 태도가 좀 눈에 들어오나 봐?
first_translate: only now do you notice my behavior toward you?
oh...
there really is something strange about you today...
fiona.
yeah?
why did you stay behind?
last time, you told me to stick close to you.
I remember.

hangle: 하지만 내 부탁이라면 다 들어줄 생각이야?
first_translate: but will you listen to whatever I tell you?
as long as I can do it myself.
as long as you can do it yourself...
let me loosen your tie again.
fiona.
yeah?
why are you willing to grant my wishes?
well,
whoops.
all done.
it’s because you’re precious to me...
s-siegren?
seriously...

hangle: 정말 사람 헷갈리게 하는 데 일가견이 있어…
first_translate: you’re too good at confusing people...
confusing people?
forget it.

hangle: 네가 자꾸 그러니 나도 마음대로 할 거야.
first_translate: since you keep doing things like that, I’ll also act however I please.
fiona.
a big midnight market is opening downtown tomorrow evening.
really?
that sounds fun.
meet me there.
I wanna hang out alone together. just the two of us.
